name: Ji Bei Chuan Noodles å­£åŒ—å· BK 86

reviews.text: Love their Sauerkraut version and Fish Rice Noodles and also Tom Yum Noodle soup. The soup base is very flavorful and great mix of ingredients combination. This is one of our go to spots on 86th Street.
ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ©ãƒ³ã®é›°å›²æ°—ã‚ã£ã¡ã‚ƒã‚ˆãã¦é£Ÿã¹ç‰©ã‚‚ã†ã¾ã„ã€‚ã¾ãŸæ¥ã‚‹
Nice place, not a lot of meat options for people that don't really like beef and intestines. They have card stamp system, which is nice. Friendly stuff.

What a nice place this is in the 86th Street section of Bay Parkway!

The food portion is just right for me to finish their Tomato Beef Brisket Noodle Soup with no problem. Their set meals as they advertised on the menu was pretty interesting. Basically, one of the sets comes with a noodle soup of your choice, an appetizer, and a drink. There are also other sets that are different.

I would definitely come back again if I was to.
I like their noodles, would order again but itâ€™s a bit pricey
Delicious Thai beef rice noodles! I will definitely add them to my go to favorite places!
Today I got the Thai style fish slice noodle and I asked for not too spicy. The food is really good for the two times I have been here. The staffs are really attentive too. Recommend!

This restaurant feels like nowhere else I've eaten. The modest size creates a homey feeling. They provide newly made food displayed impressively. The staff takes extra steps to assist. My time here was beyond expectations.
Very good food and nice place
Highly recommend. I was craving something heart warming and this was exactly what I needed.
Great place if youâ€™re craving noodle soups and appetizers

ong ts place so tuff boi come here like the sigma alpha because ts place makes you unleash your inner alpha RAHHH and omg my mouth watered the moment the food came like my mouth was like ğŸ˜‹ğŸ¤¤ anyways ya come to this tuff and sigma place

I ordered fish maw with chicken soup and I have to say this is one of those must try soup. Creamy, delicious and the chicken is soft. But beware, this is served boiling so you must be very careful not to get burn. Fast service and the place is clean.

Pretty good and flavorful noodle spot. Thereâ€™s multiple specials they offer here. You can get a stamp card and get a free bowl for every 10th. You can load up a prepaid card for bonus credits. We did $300 and got $50 bonus. Thereâ€™s also 2 different special menu options that offer a bowl of noodles, small appetizer, and a drink for $17.95 option. All in all, they try really hard to promote their business and find value for their customers which is a major plus. I ordered the beef tomato soup base, which came out piping hot! So be careful to not burn your tongue/ mouth. The place itself feels super well organized and clean, albeit not that big, so expect a long wait during dinner rush hours. Friendly staff is also a plus here!

I placed my order through Panda Eats. The Tom Yum noodle soup was okay, but I personally prefer a stronger, more flavorful brothâ€”it felt a bit light. The brown sugar mochi was sweet and chewy, but slightly greasy for my taste. I think with a few small tweaks, the dishes could be much better!
Delicious! Excellent service! Clean and beautiful cafe-restaurant! Now one of our favorite places

The restaurant is located in the Bensonhurst section of Brooklyn.  They prepare Chinese cuisine.  They have tables and servers for dining in.  Various noodle soups, cold dishes, appetizers and beverages are available.  They have additional locations in Chinatown in  Manhattan and Flushing, Queens.  I ordered the dumplings in spicy oil and crispy coconut lava balls as appetizers.  The seafood tom yum soup with rice noodles had a nice variety of seafood.  The silken tofu with fish slices was a smooth and light soup with rice noodles.  The food was well-prepared and packaged well in an insulated reusable bag.  Friendly and helpful staff.
Great food. Clean space. Friendly service from the staff. Came in with my daughter and the servers really made a point to take care of us. Thank you.

Best noodle place in all of brooklyn. Immediately as you walk in the staff treats you with a warm welcome and sits you down. The noodles were also really good and high quality especially for the price. The staff are also really helpful. I honestly confused why theres not much people that come here.
Sopas ricas

Their soups are likely created using concentrated powders or pastes, which means you are eating preservatives. You need to ask the question: What's inside those powders and where they were manufactured. Since this is a China based chain restaurant, I wouldn't trust any consumables imported frome that country. Eating these once in a while is fine, but not daily.

noodle soup not only for winterï¼Œbetter in summerï¼Œwas very busy on Sunday when I went through. Decide to give it try. Nice choiceï¼Œsauerkraut soup rice noodle. Very good atmosphere. Definitely will be back soon, next time I will try the sause mixed noodles which looks good and in very big portions.
Great location,cosy and comfort environmentï¼Œenthusiast staff. Absolutely loved my experience here!

My mom came here with her friend on a Saturday and didnâ€™t have to wait for a table. They enjoyed the food which came out to $30. When they went to pay they gave $40 and expected their change and then they would leave a tip. Instead, the cashier didnâ€™t give them the full change. He just gave them back $4 and straight up said $6 is for tip without even giving them a chance to say anything.

Seems they took advantage of them being elders and wouldnâ€™t say anything. Wonâ€™t be going back even though the food was pretty good.

My recent experience with a takeout order of two tomato beef briskets was quite disappointing. Having previously held a favorable impression of this establishment, I recommended it to a friend on this occasion. However, when we started eating, we found only three to four small pieces of beef briskets in each order. Also, the quality of the brisket was concerning. A notable portion exhibited an unpleasant odor, im sure its been in the freezer for a very long time, the restaurant must have thought that customer wouldn't notice mixing fresh and old ingredients together, and the texture was markedly rubbery. Nothing like before. Beside that, my friend also discovered a piece of plastic within their noodle dish. This is usually what franchises do: they make the dishs more generous and better when starting, then drop the quality and ingredients to cut cost.
It's been my favorite place for so long, and im not going back ever again.

The soup broth at this 86th Street location is top notch. The R21. Fish Soup Fresh Mushroom with Fish Slices Rice Noodles is very flavorful. The appetizers are very good. (Woodear, Cucumber salad with scallion sauce and assorted meats) if you get the special offering which includes a drink you will not get the stamp to fill out the card. Enjoy!

Craving a taste of authentic comfort food? This is Chinese Noodles restaurant where every dish feels like a warm embrace. While their name might suggest a focus solely on noodles, it's their fish soups that are the real showstoppers. Each spoonful is a journey into a rich, flavorful broth, packed with tender fish and perfectly balanced spices. It's the kind of soup that nourishes your mind. Beyond the incredible soups, the staff is super nice and atmosphere is very welcoming.
I highly recommend giving it a taste

P.S. portions are huge ;)
å‘³é“è¶…æ£’ï¼Œéå¸¸ç¾å‘³

We got the lunch specials, tomato and beef noodle soup, and fish and tofu noodle soup. The bowls are very big. The lunch special also includes some small appetizers. The fish tofu was really good! It also came with drinks of either the passion fruit sparking juice or plum fruit juice. Would recommend for the price!
å‘³é“éå¸¸æ§
Ji Bei Chuan Noodles really hit the spot. I got the tomato intestine noodle soup â€” the broth was rich and comforting, and the noodles had a great chew.
Fried tofu with sause so delicious, the best chicken wings in 86st. Also recommend brown sugar rice cake. Service good. We come every week.
æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦å¤ªå·®
ä¸œè¥¿ä¾¿å®œåˆå¥½åƒ æ€§ä»·æ¯”é«˜

Came with a group of 6 and shared the  Original Chicken (deep; rich), Tomato with beef slice (tangy; delicious), and Seafood Tom Yum soup (spicy, flavorful). Their tea selection is delicious as well and the service was attentive and friendly. Highly recommend!
Best fried chicken wings and the portions for the rice noodles are big.
Recommend combo, must get R10, it comes with one snack and drink. Passionfruit drink good for summer.
Soup base very goodï¼Œ tasty, service good. Recommod mala spicy
Delicious food, great service, comfortable environment
Delicious food, great service, comfortable environment

Very welcoming staff! Some of the best ramen in Columbus and quick service. Most definitely will be coming back!!

I donâ€™t know how many times i ate at this restaurant or pickup, every thing is great food and service ğŸ‘ , i love woodear salad , chicken wings and especially seafood tum yum soup is my regular and thai style soup with beef perfection
Clean! Tasty! Friendly!
A great place for noodles. Love the packaging of the take out.

This is my third time visiting Ji Bei Chuan (with a group this time), and the people always give the best service and food. The atmosphere is also lively, but very relaxing. I highly recommend anyone who visits to order their Seafood Tom Yum Soup and dumplings. For drinks, their Honey Citron Tea is so refreshing (their deal for it is online only). â˜ºï¸ğŸ¥° The food came quick and I'm happy everytime I visit.
A+

Amazing comfort food, great location, and very good service!

The cucumber salad is delicious, scallion avocado green sauce with peanuts on it makes it so good. Chicken wings were also fresh with sweet and sour sauce.

For entree I got the minced pork noodle. Sauce was perfect, not too heavy, peanut buttery and rich.

This was my second visit, will definitely come again. Food was super filling and enjoyable, plus the staff was attentive and super nice :)

If you're a fan of rice noodles, Jibeichuan is an absolute must-visit. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a warm, inviting atmosphere that makes you feel right at home. The menu is packed with a wide variety of rice noodle dishes, each bursting with bold and delicious flavors.

What truly stands out is the freshness of the noodles â€” perfectly chewy, with just the right texture. I tried their signature dish, and it was hands down one of the best rice noodle dishes I've ever had. The broth was rich and flavorful, with just the right balance of spices, and the toppings were fresh and generous.

The service was impeccable â€” friendly, attentive, and quick, which really enhanced the overall experience. Whether you're looking for a comforting bowl of noodles on a cold day or craving something flavorful and satisfying, Jibeichuan has got you covered.

Highly recommend it for anyone in the mood for authentic, mouthwatering rice noodles. Canâ€™t wait to return!

Every time I go here, the servers are so nice. If you collect enough points, you get a free water bottle. I love ordering the Thai style rice noodle soup with beef slices, but the broth can be spicy for some. Honestly, even the appetizers are really good like the cold marinated chicken, sausage kebab, and chicken wings.

I went to Ji Bei Chuan Authentic Asian Noodles in Brooklyn, NY with my partner to try their Supreme Fish Maw and Chicken rice noodles (1st two images) and Sauerkraut soup with fish slices and rice noodles (last two images). Both are very flavorful. The chicken noodles are delightful and reminds me of my mother's chicken soup. The fish slices noodle soup is sour but tasty. It contrasts well with the chicken noodle soup. Will definitely visit again to try some of their other dishes!

The servers are so friendly and polite. I really enjoy dining here. I ordered tomato fish fillet rice noodles which was really delicious. And the new drinks they recommend: Hey JB milk green ! Very delicious!
The waitresses are super nice. We ordered the cucumber, tastes so fresh. Like it!!!  The rice noodles are large amount, enough for two girl.

We started off with some appetizers (shredded potatoes salad and the crispy coconut lava ball). The shredded potatoes salad was delicious and the perfect balance of savory and tangy. The crispy coconut lava balls were also really good but I think next time we would save it for a dessert. I got the beef slices tomato soup rice noodles and it was really filling. I love how much beef slices were in it! My bf got the beef brisket sauced mixed noodles and it was also really good! It was giving peanut-ey noodles with Szechuan spice. Everyone here was also really nice and attentive. 10/10 would highly recommend this spot!
è‡³å°ŠèŠ±èƒ¶é¸¡ç±³ç²‰çœŸæ˜¯åä¸è™šä¼ ï¼Œææ–™åè¶³ï¼Œæ±¤æµ“å‘³é²œï¼Œå†¬é˜´åŠŸæµ·é²œä¹Ÿå¾ˆä¸é”™ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«è¦èµç¾ä¸‹è‚‰é…±å¹²æ‹Œç²‰ï¼Œä¸€æ•´ç¢—æˆ‘å®¶å¤§å®å¿«è¦åƒå®Œï¼Œä»–è¯´å¾ˆå¥½åƒï¼Œä¸‹æ¬¡è¿˜è¦æ¥

This is a great spot for delicious rice noodles, offering both soup-based and sauced options. What I particularly appreciate is that the sauced noodles are served warm. The portions are generous, though itâ€™s not the most budget friendly option - but you get what you pay for.

å‘³é“æµ“éƒï¼Œåˆ†é‡ä¹Ÿè¶³å¤Ÿï¼Œæˆ‘ç‚¹äº†é…¸èœé±¼çš„é±¼ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æœ‰çš®çš„æ–°é²œé±¼ç‰‡ï¼Œå¹³æ—¶å¤–é¢åƒçš„å¤šçš„éƒ½æ˜¯é¾™åˆ©é±¼ä¸ç®—æ–°é²œé±¼ï¼Œè¿™ä¸€ç‚¹æœ‰æƒŠè‰³åˆ°æˆ‘ã€‚çº¢ç³–ç³ç²‘ä¹Ÿå¾ˆå¥½åƒï¼Œç™¾é¦™æœæ°”æ³¡æ°´ä¹Ÿä¸é”™å’Œå¥—é¤ä¸€èµ·ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸é”™çš„é€‰æ‹©ã€‚ç•ªèŒ„å‘³çš„æ±¤åº•ä¹Ÿå¾ˆç¾å‘³ï¼Œä¸‹æ¬¡è¦å»è¯•è¯•å†¬é˜´åŠŸå’Œé‡‘æ±¤çš„

Comfort food & great service!

I came here with my parents on a weekend afternoon for lunch and it was busy. Had to wait around 10 minutes for a table but I didnâ€™t mind.

We all ordered the Tomato Soup Beef Brisket Rice Noodles and shared an Assorted Beef plate.
Soup was piping hot, noodles were soft, good amount of toppings and the flavor was great! The assorted beef was also tender and flavorful.

Would definitely come back again to try their other soups!

ä½œä¸ºç¾é£Ÿçˆ±å¥½è€…ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ—¶å¸¸åœ¨åŸå¸‚çš„è¡—è§’å¯»è§…ç€é‚£äº›è®©äººå‚æ¶æ¬²æ»´çš„ç¾é£Ÿèƒœåœ°ã€‚ç„¶è€Œï¼Œå½“æˆ‘è¸å…¥è¿™å®¶é¤å…æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¸ç¦è¢«çœ¼å‰æ‰€å‘ˆç°çš„æ™¯è±¡æ‰€éœ‡æ’¼â€”â€”ç»šä¸½å¤šå½©çš„è£…æ½¢ï¼Œæ¸©é¦¨èˆ’é€‚çš„æ°›å›´ï¼Œä»¥åŠé‚£ä¸€ç›˜ç›˜ä»¤äººå‚æ¶æ¬²æ»´çš„ä½³è‚´ï¼Œè¿™ä¸€åˆ‡æ„æˆäº†è¿™å®¶é¤å…ç‹¬ç‰¹çš„é­…åŠ›ã€‚

æ€»çš„æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè¿™å®¶é¤å…ä¸ä»…ä»…æ˜¯ä¸€å¤„ç”¨é¤ä¹‹åœ°ï¼Œæ›´æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¾é£Ÿçš„å¤©å ‚ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªè®©äººå¿ƒæ—·ç¥æ€¡çš„åœ°æ–¹ã€‚æˆ‘ç›¸ä¿¡ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä½æ¥åˆ°è¿™é‡Œçš„é¡¾å®¢éƒ½ä¼šè¢«è¿™é‡Œçš„ç¾é£Ÿå’Œæ°›å›´æ‰€å¸å¼•ï¼Œç•™ä¸‹ç¾å¥½çš„å›å¿†ã€‚

Lovely service, they were really kind and polite. The space is nicely lit and clean. The coconut lava balls are really good too! Crispy and sweet. I also loved their mushroom soup, super great for someone who loves mushrooms.

Walked by this place a few times, finally tried it and was not disappointed. Service was good, the food came quickly and tasted great. The free tea they provide is the best tea I've had in a while. Price was reasonable too. Might be my new go to place for noodles.

Food was great and customer service was top notch.

The noodles were fresh and steaming hot but good.
The location of this new restaurant is super convenient - right off the D train. The food is amazing too! Really quick service as well. Iâ€™ve been here twice now.
I try the tomato soup  with beef slice ğŸ˜‹, Sweet and a little bit sour. The boiling soup so yummy, next time I will try another flavor. Also and the staff kept refilling my tea.
It's nice to have a place that still opens after 9 pm on Sunday. The staff are super friendly! The ingredients they used are pretty fresh and the flavor is pretty good. Will definitely come again

Hard to find parking but it's worth it.  The food is as exceptional good. The service is better than the one on 8 ave.  Food is more for Cantonese not spicy.  The atmosphere is much better and more like a restaurant. Highly recommended to give it a try before they get busy.

This place makes traditional Chinese fish soup and fresh drinks. I had the fish and chicken soup and a passion fruit sparkling water. Both were good. The chicken was complete with skin. The service can be a little underwhelming.
Great service. Food came out fast and fresh. The appetizers are really good here.

Came here for lunch with my family. I got the fish and mushroom noodles. The broth was mild and very easy for the stomach. The atmosphere was great and the staff were super friendly! The portion was a good size and was definitely filling. Would definitely come back again!
Really good food and service. The waiters are always attentive and polite. They also have a rewards card itâ€™s great I always dine in . I rec the spicy slice beef Thai soup noodle

New noodle place on 86 Street that's different than the others around. Their braised beef, shank and tripe were delicious. Also tried their cucumber salad which was refreshing.

Absolutely loved my experience! I ordered the fish maw chicken noodle soup and it was exceptional. The soup base was rich and flavorful, and the noodle texture was just right. The environment was also very pleasant, adding to the overall dining experience. Five stars from me, and I'll definitely be coming back for more!
Came here with my girlfriend and enjoyed a cozy noodle soup! It was clean and the original bone broth was heart warming. They even gave us some dessert for Valentineâ€™s Day
